title: One November Just Came Around

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Protect a player from death during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The amount of Defense given depends on the age of this role. The tier of the Defense is equal to the number of days this role has existed divided by 100, rounded up, to a maximum of Overprotective. [Role created on 11/14/22. Defense upgrades to Powerful on 2/22/23, Unstoppable on 6/2/23, and Overprotective on 9/10/23]
-If your target is attacked, you will deal an Attack 1 tier lower than the Defense you give to one random person attacking your target.
-If a player holding this role loses a game, the timer should reset to 0 days.
-If this role visits, is visited by, or saves someone from November (1206), it will deal an Overkill Attack to it.

desc:
Post 2709
*Just to shake the sky and move the ground...*
